section.para: Conditional expressions provided a value whether our boolean expression evaluated to true \textit{or} false. We can similarly provide an alternative block of statements we want executed if the boolean expression used in our if statement evaluates to false by using an \textit{else} statement. Else statements look exactly like if statements but must immediately follow the end of the if statement.
